newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Taiwan buys Apr 16-30 N+A naphtha at $210-$215/T.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan buys Apr 16-30 N+A naphtha at $210-$215/T.

text.p: Taiwan's state-owned Chinese Petroleum Corp (CPC) has awarded its tender to buy 28,000 tonnes of heavy naphthenic-and-aromatic (N+A) naphtha in April at $210-$215 per tonne on a cost-and-freight (c-and-f) basis, a company offcial said on Tuesday.
The tender, which closed March 3, sought the cargo for delivery April 16-30 to Kaohsiung.
The award was much lower than CPC's last N+A purchase at the end of December for February 19-28 delivery of almost $250 per tonne c-and-f.
